 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרַי‎</span> **proper name, feminine** ==wife of Abram== ([[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xiii (1888). 484</sup> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:80l»§ 80l</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1. 427 make</sup> = foregoing, with old feminine ending <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ַ י‎</span>; &gt; [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 92, Anm. \*, emphasizing different</sup> in [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]], derived from a √ <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, and compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, name of a barren mountain; compare [[BDB#RS|RS]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׂרָאֵל‎</span> above, below I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂרה‎</span>); — [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Σαρα</span>; — [[Gen.11.30|Gen 11:30]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), v[[Gen.11.31|Gen 11:31]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Gen.12.5|Gen 12:5]]; [[Gen.12.11|Gen 12:11]]; [[Gen.12.17|Gen 12:17]]; [[Gen.16.1|Gen 16:1]]; [[Gen.16.2|Gen 16:2]]; [[Gen.16.3|Gen 16:3]]; [[Gen.16.5|Gen 16:5]]; [[Gen.16.6|Gen 16:6]] (twice in verse); [[Gen.16.8|Gen 16:8]] (twice in verse) (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.17.15|Gen 17:15]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרָ֑י‎</span> [[Gen.11.29|Gen 11:29]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.16.2|Gen 16:2]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.17.15|Gen 17:15]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂשׂוֺן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂשׂן‎</span> see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂוֺשׂ‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׂת‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂאֵת‎</span> below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשׂא‎</span> p.673a.
